ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LPIdeal ` R ) = ( LPIdeal ` R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LIdeal ` R ) = ( LIdeal ` R ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_islpir | |- ( R e. LPIR <-> ( R e. Ring /\ ( LIdeal ` R ) = ( LPIdeal ` R ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_simplbi | |- ( R e. LPIR -> R e. Ring ) |
